content: Please note that some of the information you will hear in today's discussion will include forward-looking statements, including, but not limited to, statements regarding our acquisition synergies, product development and performance, comparisons to our competitors, market opportunity, product sales and future demand, business and strategic opportunities, customer and partner engagement, projections of future operations and financial results, availability of funds, as well as statements containing words like potential, believe, expect, plans, and other similar expressions.
